scripts.sass:process: pnpm run sass:tokens && sass src/scss/global.scss src/_includes/assets/css/global.css --style=compressed
scripts.cms:precompile: make-dir dist/admin && pnpm nunjucks-precompile src/_includes > dist/admin/templates.js -i "\.(njk|css|svg)$"
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm run sass:process -- --watch" "pnpm run cms:bundle -- --watch" "chokidar \"src/_includes/**\" -c \"pnpm run cms:precompile\"" "pnpm run serve"
scripts.production: pnpm run sass:process && pnpm run cms:precompile && pnpm run cms:bundle && pnpx eleventy
